content: the national wwii museum is proud to launch its own **knit your bit** campaign you can help the museum honor wwii veterans by knitting your bit - in this case a simple but cozy scarf to be donated to a veteran in a veterans center somewhere in the united states materials * 2 skeins olive drab or equivalent mc 190yds per skein * 1 skein cream or equivalent cc * size 5 50 size i or higher crochet hook depending on the thread of your choice
